::Dark Rodimus::
   
  Rodimus looks puzzled as Hydras mentions his former friends but he dismisses the comment.
   
  Rodimus: Track them down and I will destroy.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

"Someone has come in and hacked... It cant be one of your former 
friends" Hissed the male

Perceptor was in his virtual battle agains the spy.

********************

Nightlight:

<Someone is inside> Her spark said to Azure's <I have the feeling 
that it isnt Maximal>

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Jhiaxus/Zarak-Scorponok/Dark Rodimus::
> 
> Jhiaxus drew his weapons ready for whatever happens. He was ready 
to follow Hydras. He noticed that the base submerging action had been 
countered in the computers.
> 
> Jhiaxus: Whoever is in the base has access to the secured 
computer systems. Where is the best place for someone to hack into 
it? Perceptor, reverse whatever they did and get us submerged.
> 
> Zarak grabs the bound Nightlight and drags her back towards her 
cell. They come across the Megatron statue and back down the corridor 
untill they reach the special cell door.
> 
> Zarak: Open.
> 
> The door swings open. Zarak removes Nightlight's restraints and 
pushes her in, sealing the cell. He turns and runs back through the 
corridor. Once past the statue he meets up with the Scorponok shell. 
Zarak transforms to the head module and connects with Scorponok, now 
in bot mode.
> 
> Scorponok follows the directions he got from Hydras.
> 
> Dark Rodimus is activated and becomes councious. The first thing 
he does is swat the spider-spy off of his neck. He doesn't realize 
what it was. Rodimus exits the room to find Jhiaxus, Hydras and 
Perceptor.
> 
> Dark Rodimus: What is the situation? Who needs to die?
> 
>



                         

       
---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile.  Try it now.
